content.question: Which of the following best characterizes the author’s mode of persuasion in the second paragraph?

choices.label: He asserts his own credibility and authority on an issue.
He appeals to the audience’s emotions regarding a controversy.
He presents himself as a neutral party in a disagreement.
He attempts to influence his audience’s beliefs about a subject.

content.answer: He asserts his own credibility and authority on an issue.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain how an argument demonstrates understanding of an audience's beliefs, values, or needs.
